name: GARFQUEST: Just Another Monday
description:
GARFQUEST Just Another Monday

Join Garfield on his best adventure yet!

THIS IS THE FIRST TEST BUILD AND IS HERE TO SEE HOW IT RUNS (IF IT RUNS) ON A WIDER SCALE THAN MY SHITTY MACBOOK AIR.

WINDOWS IS UNTESTED

LINUX IS UNTESTED

MAC IS TESTED BUT SLIGHTLY BROKEN

Please leave comments on what you would like to see, or bugs/things that happened to you!

3 WORLDS SO FAR!
